timeline.bodyText:
Sorry for being a PITA but still not a big fan to get/update a boolean value on /flightservice path.
Could we have something like /flightservice/timeout or /flightservice/shouldtimeout ?
or if want to keep /flightservice, then we should get/update a configuration structure. but it is more complex.
timeline.author: radtriste

replies.bodyText: I agree, adding to /flightservice/shouldtimeout is even more flexible in case we need to add more actions to the flightservice other than the timeout.
